definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
in the right and self-confident (idiom); bold and confident with justice on one's side/to have the courage of one's convictions/just and forceful
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂[Gui4], capital Nanning 南寧|南宁[Nan2 ning2]/until 1959, Guangxi province
pinyin: Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale

sentences.english: But you are taller and stronger than I (am).
Only he was much, much bigger than he was in my dream.
sentences.chinese: 但比起在我梦中的样子，他现在非常非常的壮。

sentences.english: Liu Jiazhuang proposed an algorithm for generating rooted trees.
sentences.chinese: 刘家壮给出了生成根树的一种算法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Zhuang medicine Bazhuguan for arthralgia-syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察壮医药物竹筒拔罐治疗痹病的疗效。

sentences.english: He is very strong. He can carry such a heavy box up.
sentences.chinese: 他非常壮，他能将一个极重的箱子扛起来。

sentences.english: Rain and dew drops nourish young seedlings.
Zhuang medicine medicated thread moxibustion is a commonly used external treatment in Zhinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 壮医药线点灸疗法是壮医常用的外治法。

sentences.english: If you can be well without health you may be happy without virtue.
sentences.chinese: 如果不健康而能强强壮壮，那么无美德也可快快乐乐。
这一成绩壮了马吕斯的胆。

sentences.english: We don't look so strong as that guy.
sentences.chinese: 我们看起来没有那家伙壮。

sentences.english: The small boy plucked up his courage and went upstairs in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 那个小男孩壮了壮胆，摸黑上了楼。

sentences.english: I have never had any chance to see these two rivers.
sentences.chinese: 虽不曾听见黄河壮，澎湃汹涌在梦里。

sentences.english: When we keep feeding a cat, the cat becomes big and strong.
sentences.chinese: 当我们这样持续喂猫，猫就会变得又大又壮。

sentences.english: I have a dog. It is big and strong.
sentences.chinese: 我有一条狗，它长得又大又壮。

sentences.english: Don't mess with the big strong dog when you pass by his yard.
sentences.chinese: 当你经过他的篱笆时，千万别惹这只又大又壮的狗儿。

sentences.english: After conditioning, form the clay into a snake. Don't make the snake too long or thick.
sentences.chinese: 整好型后，将陶泥撮成条壮，不要把条撮得太长太粗。

definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
back of a tiger and waist of a bear/tough and stocky build
waist of a bear and back of a tiger/tough and stocky build
thin/to lose weight/(of clothing) tight/(of meat) lean/(of land) unproductive
